value:
Wriggle like a worm trying to escape
my boot, or die squished like a
worthless maggot.$k$pEither way, you are little more than an
insect.

Ugh... My splitting head... I remember
nothing of my time in that other
world... Nothing at all.

How about you stop pretending to be
so selfless and tell me what you really
wish for? Maybe I can grant it...

You show promise, despite being
human. Of course, that's like being
the smartest worm in the dirt.$k$pBut still... I see enough in you
that I could entertain the idea
of keeping you by my side.

Memories or no, I will lay waste to the
world all the same. You think me so
fickle I'd change my mind?

Heh, don't look so frightened. Your
friend $Nf is
perfectly safe... For now.

Insolent worms... I shall teach you
what it means to feel true fear.

I suppose this will be enough for
stomping lowly insects.

I already possess more than
enough power to crush humans.

This power surpasses that of the
gods. I will bring destruction...

I am the wings of despair. I am the
breath of ruin. I am the fell dragon,
Grima.$k$pPay me the respect I am due, and I
will consider granting you a quick
death when the time comes.

Come to butter me up some more?
How very irksome. I've nothing to
chat about with a human.$k$pHumans spout their ideals, but it's
nothing but lip service. Let's all join
together and hold hands, you'll say.$k$pWe can overcome our differences
despite being different species,
despite our differing core ideologies.$k$pThe truth is what you see daily in this
place. Day after day, night after night,
all you have is never-ending war.$k$pOne person's satisfaction means
another must suffer. That is the truth
of all worlds.$k$pBut my power of destruction is the
one true equalizer.$k$pIf you think there's someone out there
capable of leading the world with such
high-minded ideas of love and bonds...$k$pI'd love to meet them.$k$pHmph. After all that, you still talk your
big talk? Very well. I'll watch over
you... Right until your bitter end.
はぁっ！
殺します
きゃああっ！
面倒ですね…
I am the Fell Dragon, Grima.
I shall end you first!
I will devour you!
This is the end.
Mere...worms...
ふふっ
I am the wings of despair. I am the breath of ruin. I am the Fell Dragon, Grima.
Am I really so interesting you must pester me?
I seem to have lost some of my memories when I crossed the skies.
How odd... I sense something...familiar about you...
If you can help me regain my memories... I shall spare your life.
If I were human, and able to live among you... Then perhaps...
Will you be my ally, or do you long for death? The choice is yours.
Yes.
Who dies first?
Choose.
